inputs.description: A string of column names or numbers to select (e.g. '1:5, 7, 9' or 'colname1, colname2, colname7')
inputs.name: oolumns

name: selectColumnsFromTable

outputs.description: An output table with only the selected columns
outputs.name: outTable

script:
require(dplyr)

cols <- gsub(" ", "", strsplit(columns, ",")[[1]])
outTable <- select_(table, cols)
